metadata.description: The name of the AD domain. For example contoso.com
The password for the administrator account of the new VM's and the domain
The name of the administrator of the new VM's and the domain.
Asset location (GitHUb) where Extension files are stored
Custom template image name to be used for RDSH servers (Managed Disk)
Resource Group where the specified RDSH Custom template image is located.
The name of the existing Subnet (case sensitive)
The name of the existing Vnet
The name of the existing Resourcegroup where the existing Vnet lives
Hostname prefix for RD Session Host Servers
Hostname prefix for Publishing Agent Servers
Hostname prefix for RD Session Host Servers
Hostname prefix for Secure Client Gateway Servers
The Windows server SKU, for example 2016-Datacenter
prefix of the internal IP Address /24 range to be used
Number of Publishing Agent instances, by default 2
Number of RD Session Hosy instances, by default 2
Number of Secure Client Gateway instances, by default 2
OU Location to store the RAS Console Server
OU Location to store the Publishing Agent Servers
OU Location to store the RD Session Host Servers
OU Location to store the Secure Client Gateway Servers
The tag you want to assign to all resources deployed by this template
The name of the RDSH Group in RAS
The e-mail address to activate RAS
The licensing password to activate RAS
Select whether the RDSH is based on a custom image or not , if Yes also specify existingCustomImageNameRDSH
VM Size for the Console role
VM Size for the Publishing Agent role
VM Size for the RD Session Host role
VM Size for the Secure Client Gateway role

resources.name: [variables('publicIpRef')]
resources.comments: This resources created a Public Static IP Address that is used by the Secure Client Gateway role

resources.name: [variables('availabilitySetNameSecureClientGateway')]
resources.comments: This resources creates an availability set that is used to make the Secure Client Gateway Servers Highly Available

resources.name: [variables('availabilitySetNamePublishingAgent')]
resources.comments: This resources creates an availability set that is used to make the Publishing Agent Servers Highly Available

resources.name: [variables('availabilitySetNameRDSessionHost')]
resources.comments: This resources creates an availablity set that is used to make the RDSH Server Highly Available

resources.name: [variables('loadbalancer').Name]
resources.comments: This resources creates a external load balancer that is used to load balance the Secure Client Gateway role

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixSecureClientGateway'),'0', copyindex(1), variables('networkAdapterNamePostFix'))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Network Adapters uased by the Secure Client Access Vitual Machines

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixPublishingAgent'),'0', copyindex(1), variables('networkAdapterNamePostFix'))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Network Adapters uased by the Publishing Agent Vitual Machines

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixRDSessionHost'),'0', copyindex(1), variables('networkAdapterNamePostFix'))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Network Adapters uased by the RD Session Host Vitual Machines

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixConsole'),'01', variables('networkAdapterNamePostFix'))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Network Adapters uased by the Console machines

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixSecureClientGateway'),'0', copyindex(1))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Machines that wil host the Secure Client Gateway role

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixSecureClientGateway'),'0', copyindex(1),'/domainjoin')]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Custom Extention to join the connected Virtual Machine to ADDS

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixSecureClientGateway'),'0',copyindex(1), '/SCG')]
resources.comments: This resources creates Firewalls Rules

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixSecureClientGateway'),'0', copyindex(1),'/BGInfo')]
resources.comments: This resources install the BGInfo extension on the connected Virtual machine

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixRDSessionHost'),'0', copyindex(1))]
resources.comments: This resources creates Virtual Machines that wil host the RDSH role

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixRDSessionHost'),'0', copyindex(1),'/domainjoin')]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Custom Extention to join the connected Virtual Machine to ADDS

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixRDSessionHost'),'0',copyindex(1), '/RDSH')]
resources.comments: This resources creates Firewalls Rules

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixRDSessionHost'),'0', copyindex(1),'/BGInfo')]
resources.comments: This resources install the BGInfo extension on the connected Virtual machine

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixPublishingAgent'),'0', copyindex(1))]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Virtual Machine that will host the Publishing Agent roles

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixPublishingAgent'),'0',copyindex(1),'/domainjoin')]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Custom Extention to join the connected Virtual Machine to ADDS

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixPublishingAgent'),'0',copyindex(1), '/PA')]
resources.comments: This resources creates Firewalls Rules

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixPublishingAgent'),'0', copyindex(1),'/BGInfo')]
resources.comments: This resources install the BGInfo extension on the connected Virtual machine

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixConsole'),'01')]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Virtual Machine that will host the RAS Console roles

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixConsole'),'01','/domainjoin')]
resources.comments: This resources creates a Custom Extention to join the connected Virtual Machine to ADDS

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixConsole'),'01', '/rasdeployment')]
resources.comments: This resources creates the RAS Deploymeny

resources.name: [concat(parameters('hostNamePrefixConsole'),'01', '/BGInfo')]
resources.comments: This resources install the BGInfo extension on the connected Virtual machine
